fullplot: During the heart of World War II, in March of 1943, cryptoanalysts at Britain's code-breaking center have discovered to their horror that Nazi U-boats have changed their Enigma Code. Authorities enlist the help of a brilliant young man named Tom Jericho to help them break the code again. The possibility of a spy within the British code-breakers' ranks looms and Tom's love, Claire, has disappeared. To solve the mysteries, Tom recruits Claire's best friend, Hester Wallace. In investigating Claire's personal life, the pair discovers personal and international betrayals.
plot: A young genius frantically races against time to crack an enemy code and solve the mystery surrounding the woman he loves.
title: Enigma

tomatoes.consensus: The well-crafted, twist-filled Enigma is a thinking person's spy thriller.
